name: Ebisu Yoshikazu no Ooana Keiti
overview: The Kyotei, literally "boat racing" and referred to as BOAT RACE, is a hydroplane racing event primary held in Japan. Ebisu Yoshikazu no Ooana Keiti features a boat racing game with a 3d engine and a complete database of all 1996 Kyotei pilots & circuits that are around Japan.
